item.title: Understanding ecological change across large spatial, temporal and taxonomic scales: integrating data and methods in light of theory
item.description: Related materials WINNER of the E4 award to receive 1000 Euros is @giorapac and @jessicablois. Congratulations on a very well-written review paper! https://t.co/uKYsz5e7sS @NordicOikos @wileyecology @Darwin2009 pic.twitter.com/Kqjbx21s1t — Ecography (@EcographyJourna) July 1, 2019 Did you find the E4 award winner paper technical and complicated? Here is a simple video to help understand the rules of #macroecology https://t.co/oVIBPcDX60 @giorapac @jessicablois @NordicOikos @wileyecology @Darwin2009 — Ecography (@EcographyJourna) July 2, 2019
